trans-unit.source: Retrieves exports from a part.
trans-unit.target: 擷取會從組件匯出。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> class, optionally in thread-safe mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>類別，或者在具備執行緒安全模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> object must be thread-safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>物件必須是安全執行緒，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> class with the specified composition options.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>使用指定的組合的選項類別。

trans-unit.source: Options that specify the behavior of this provider.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者的指定行為的選項。

trans-unit.source: Executes composition on the specified batch.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的批次執行組合。

trans-unit.source: The batch to execute composition on.
trans-unit.target: 要在執行組合批次。

trans-unit.source: The container is already in the process of composing.
trans-unit.target: 容器已經在撰寫中。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`Dispose`當您完成使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法會使<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>所佔用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫`Dispose`釋放您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all exports in this provider that match the conditions of the specified import.
trans-unit.target: 取得此提供者中符合指定的匯入之條件的所有匯出的集合。

trans-unit.source: Implementers should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and should not throw exceptions for cardinality-related mismatches.
trans-unit.target: 實作者應該基數相關不符不視為錯誤，因此應該不會擲回例外狀況的基數相關不符。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has no matching exports or more than one, the GetExportsCore method should return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果匯入要求一個匯出，而且該提供者有沒有相符的匯出，或一個以上，GetExportsCore 方法應傳回空<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>集合<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref> that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> to get.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>定義之條件的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>取得。

trans-unit.source: The composition transaction to use, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to disable transactional composition.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用，綜合交易或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>停用交易式的組合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all exports in this provider that match the specified conditions.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者中符合指定的條件的所有匯出的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the export provider that provides access to additional <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定匯出提供者可存取其他<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before accessing any methods on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性必須先設定存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider>上的任何方法

trans-unit.source: A provider that provides the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> access to <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供的提供者<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>存取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"> </xref>已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: This property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性已經設定。

trans-unit.source: -or- The methods on the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref> have already been accessed.
trans-unit.target: -方法<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ComposablePartExportProvider"></xref>被存取。
